name: @jadesrochers/fpstreamline
author: Jared Desrochers
description: Functional programming additions to pass arrays, manipulate data

scripts.packagePatch: npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
scripts.updatePatch: npm update && npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
scripts.packageMinor: npm run test && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push -u origin master
